application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Bay, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1.5 metres. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 5 meters tall and 4 meters wide.T2. Rowan, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 4 meters tall and 2 meters wide.T3. Laburnum, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 3 meters tall and 2 meters wide.T5. Silver Birch, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 2 metres. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 8 meters tall and 4 meters wide.
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
